title: Error after transfer server from NA to Japan ! plz help
body:
i was tranfered my account from server NA to Japan yesterday, after that still work great. But now, i can't loggin anymore.
Japan loggins screen said :"**Your account has transferred to another region. Please try logging in to the appropriate region**."
NA said :"**Invalid username/password combination.  Please try again.**"
I hearded this is one-way transfer so i think its still being in Japan. Please help me!

replies.body: When you transferred your account, did it ask you to change your Username at all?  It is also possible your account got compromised and someone moved it back to NA from Japan.  If you are sure you didn't change your Username, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  One of our Account Recovery Specialists should be able to help out!
It didnt ask me to change username, and I am not the original owner, my friend had to transfer ownership to me, he had busy and dont have time to play. But im still contacting with him.

Account Sharing is against our Terms of Use, so we can only restore ownership to the original owner.  Since you aren't, there isn't anything you can do specifically unfortunately.  You'll need to contact your friend to get it sorted out.

Hope that helps!
